html:
Sept 13 (Reuters) - Wall Street securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several U.S.-listed companies, including Cairn Energy, Neoen and Stillfront Group on Monday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Aker Carbon Capture ASA ACCC.OL: HSBC cuts to hold from buy

* Cairn Energy Plc CNE.L: Berenberg cuts to hold from buy

* Neoen SA NEOEN.PA: Berenberg initiates with hold rating and EUR 39 price target

* Polypeptide Group AG PPGN.S: Credit Suisse cuts to neutral from outperform

* Stillfront Group AB (Publ) SFRG.ST: HSBC raises to hold from reduce

Following is a summary of research actions on U.S. companies reported by Reuters on Monday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* 888 Holdings Plc 888.L: Berenberg raises target price to 600p from 470p

* 888 Holdings Plc 888.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 750p from 500p

* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: Citigroup raises price target to 305p from 300p

* Aker Carbon Capture ASA ACCC.OL: HSBC cuts to hold from buy

* Aker Carbon Capture ASA ACCC.OL: HSBC raises target price to NOK 23 from NOK 20

* Allianz SE ALVG.DE: Berenberg cuts to hold from buy

* Amundi SA AMUN.PA: Citigroup raises price target to EUR 89 from EUR 86

* Arcadis NV ARDS.AS: ING raises target price to EUR 53 from EUR 45

* Ashmore ASHM.L: Citigroup cuts price target to 406p from 415p

* Atenor ATEO.BR: ING raises target price to EUR 62 from EUR 60.80

* Billerudkorsnas AB (publ) BILL.ST: Danske Bank cuts to hold from buy

* CMC Markets Plc CMCX.L: RBC cuts target price to 410p from 560p

* Deutsche Telekom AG DTEGn.DE: Bernstein raises target price to EUR 28.80 from EUR 27.30

* DWS Group GmbH & Co KgaA DWSG.DE: Citigroup raises target to EUR 45.5 from EUR 45

* EasyJet EZJ.L: Berenberg cuts target price to 720p from 930p

* Embracer Group AB EMBRACb.ST: HSBC raises target price to SEK 300 from SEK 290

* ENI ENI.MI: Bernstein raises target price to EUR 13 from EUR 9

* Equinor ASA EQNR.OL: Bernstein cuts target price to NOK 260 from NOK 265

* Galp Energia SA GALP.LS: Bernstein raises target price to EUR 13 from EUR 12

* Gamma Communications Plc GAMA.L: Jefferies cuts to underperform from hold

* Getlink GETP.PA: HSBC upgrades to buy vs hold

* Gresham House Plc GHE.L: Berenberg raises target price to 1,150p from 1,050p

* KBC Groep NV KBC.BR: UBS raises target price to EUR 60 from EUR 57

* Mediclinic MDCM.L: UBS raises target price to 334p from 320p

* Norsk Hydro ASA NHY.OL: Citigroup raises price target to NOK 85 from NOK 78
